name: Red Snow (HeneGames)
description:
You play as a small robot whose ship has run out of fuel. You had to land on a planet full of scary snowman monsters. Fortunately, your ship runs on coal and the snowmen's buttons are made of it. 

Collect 250 coal buttons to get off the planet.

Keyboard

  • Move buttons = WASD
  • Jump = Space (In air double jump)
  • Walk = Lshift
  • Dash = Q
  • Look = Mouse
  • ESC = Exit game

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controller

  • Jump = Button South  (In air double jump)
  • Walk = L1
  • Dash = Button West
  • Move = Left stick
  • Look = Right stick
